div.p: The Summers County School System shall involve the total community in preparing each citizen to enter the workforce, college, or other post secondary training and in developing them to their fullest potential as 21st century active, self-directed, lifelong learners.
If you have any questions or comments please email kmsears@k12.wv.us and they will be directed to the correct department.
